櫹字的基本解释

櫹
xiāo
〔櫹槮（
古书上说的一种大树：“其树则有木兰梫桂，杞櫹椅桐。”s卬 ）〕ａ．草木茂盛，ｂ．树木花叶凋落。

櫹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiāo］
［《集韻》先彫切，平蕭，心。］
见“櫹槮”。
[②]［qiū］
［《類篇》雌由切］
木名。即楸。

櫹字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　櫹； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页562第15
【集韻】先雕切，音蕭。櫹槮，草木盛貌。又草木落貌。見槮字註。　又【類篇】疎鳩切，音?。木長貌。　又【類篇】山巧切，梢上聲。義同。　又【類篇】雌由切，音秋。木名。亦作橚。

櫹字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
櫹字的起名意思

古书上说的一种大树，也指草木茂盛。

Qiu
Basic explanation of words
Qiu
xiāo
〔櫹槮(
A kind of big tree said in ancient books: "The tree contains Magnolia osmanthus and Qiqiu Yitong." s 卬)] a. Lush vegetation, b. The flowers and leaves of the trees are withered.
Qiu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [xiāo]
["Ji Yun" first carved and cut, Ping Xiao, heart. ]
See "Qiu Fu".
[②]［qiū］
["Like Pian" by Fei Yuqi]
Wooden name. That is Catalpa.
Qiu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　櫹; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 562 15
[Ji Yun] Carve and cut first, sound Xiao. Qiufu, the grass and trees are magnificent. The vegetation fell again. See the note to the word 槮.　[Classes] Nine Dove Cuts, Sound?. Mu long appearance.　[Classes] Shan Qiao cut, and the sound of the sound. The same meaning.　[Classes] Feiyuqi, Yinqiu. Wooden name. Also used as 橚.
Qiu
Source glyph
Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China
Taiwan Minutes
Hong Kong Mingti
Korean Ming Dynasty
Qiu
Name meaning
The big tree mentioned in ancient books also refers to the lush vegetation.
xiāo, qiū, xiū
